thread.title: Christina El Moussa's Bikini Pictures Have Us All Wondering About Her Workouts
thread.title_full: Christina El Moussa's Bikini Pictures Have Us All Wondering About Her Workouts

author: Dominique Astorino
title: Christina El Moussa's Bikini Pictures Have Us All Wondering About Her Workouts
text:
Christina El Moussa Exercise and Fitness Christina El Moussa's Bikini Pictures Have Us All Wondering About Her Workouts March 30, 2017 98 Shares Chat with us on Facebook Messenger. Learn what's trending across POPSUGAR. 
HGTV star Christina El Moussa is looking fitter than ever â€” just look at this bikini picture! A post shared by Cash The Frenchie (@cashiethefrenchbulldog) on Mar 22, 2017 at 2:00pm PDT 
As Christina is going through the process of a very public divorce from her husband, Tarek , she's turning to yoga and running as her release . 
"There is nothing like a good three-mile run for me to really clear my head and get my endorphins going," she told People . "My other go-to is yoga. I have the most amazing private instructor who has changed my life. Our sessions are very spiritual and have really helped me cope with my divorce and other emotions I'm going through during this time." 
People also reported that Christina has fallen in love with Orangetheory Fitness , which she said, "helped to get me in the best shape of my 30s!" It's no surprise that she loves the challenging, running-based workout that also incorporates weight training. Related: Exercise Out Your Bad Feelings With This Angry Breakup Workout Soundtrack ADVERTISEMENT 
She's been flaunting all her hard work with some adorable bikini pictures with her daughter and puppy, but it hasn't come without some controversy and backlash . A few negative Nancys have taken to their social media soapbox to express their distaste with her personal choices in apparel. Hmm. 
Regardless of the naysayers and haters, we're so inspired that Christina turned to fitness and taking good care of her body in a time of emotional distress. After all, exercise is a great way to cure a broken heart .
